title: Display Test Article
content:
1. IntroductionThis is a display test article designed to preview how different elements render in the Hexo Butterfly theme.
It helps you check:

Typography and spacing
Dark / light mode appearance
Code blocks and syntax highlighting
Images, lists, tables, and quotes
Special components and alerts


2. Headings TestH1 HeadingH2 HeadingH3 HeadingH4 HeadingH5 HeadingH6 Heading
3. Text FormattingNormal text looks like this.
Bold textItalic textStrikethrough textInline code

This is a blockquote.It is often used for notes or important remarks.


4. ListsUnordered List
Cybersecurity

Reverse Engineering

Vulnerability Research

CVE
CWE
CVSS



Ordered List
Reconnaissance
Exploitation
Privilege Escalation
Persistence


5. Code Block TestPythondef hello():    print("Hello, Butterfly Theme!")hello()

Bashhexo cleanhexo generatehexo server

C / C++#include <stdio.h>int main() {    printf("Display test\n");    return 0;}

HTTPGET /v1/status HTTP/1.1 Host: api.example.com User-Agent: Hexo-Butterfly-Test Accept: application/json Connection: close

C#using System;class Program {    static void Main(string[] args) {        Console.WriteLine("Hello, Butterfly Theme! background background background background background background background");    }}

7. Image Test
Image caption example

8. Links
External link: Butterfly Official Site
Internal link: Home


9. Alerts / Notes
‚ö†Ô∏è WarningThis is a warning-style blockquote.


üí° TipUse this area for tips or key takeaways.


10. Math FormulaInline formula: ( E = mc^2 )
Block formula:
$$\int_{0}^{\infty} e^{-x} dx = 1$$

11. Mermaid Diagramgraph TD  A[User Input] --> B[Hexo]  B --> C[Butterfly Theme]  C --> D[Rendered Page]


12. ConclusionIf everything above renders correctly, your theme configuration is working perfectly.
This article can be reused after future upgrades to quickly verify:

Theme updates
Plugin changes
Custom CSS overrides

Happy blogging.

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
